name: Hunnewell Homeruns (Godot Wild #22)
description:
An early (arguably unfinished) version of a baseball themed JRPG for Godot Wild #22. Not enough time was left for fleshing out the overworld or adding any story, so don't mind the small walkable area.

Expect a post-jam version with fully realized combat, inventory and exploration, along with a post mortem writeup!

This was my first time properly working with both Godot and Tiled, so please excuse the awkward graphical errors and visible out of bounds areas.
